snippet: Joe Drape, Jay Schreiber and Jim Luttrell of The Times joined readers in a Google Plus video hangout to handicap Saturday's Kentucky Derby and talk about the state of horse racing.
abstract: Joe Drape, Jay Schreiber and Jim Luttrell of The Times joined readers in a Google Plus video hangout to handicap Saturday's Kentucky Derby and talk about the state of horse racing.

headline.main: Discussing the Kentucky Derby via Google Plus Hangout
